languages.text: "Считаю, что Вашей Светлости необходимо пробиваться на заставу блюстителей. Там вам будет безопаснее, а мы тут переведем дух и выкурим из нор еще десяток-другой еретиков. Если Бог-Император будет милостив, и я смогу избежать славной гибели с вашим именем на устах, то мне предстоит большая работа по ревизии ущерба судну и потерь экипажа. Но это уже привычная процедура, я в ней изрядно поднаторел".

"I think Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should head for the enforcers' post. You will be safer there. Meanwhile, we will take a breather and smoke a few more dozen heretics out of their holes. God-Emperor willing, I will not have to die a glorious death with your name on my lips after all and will instead begin auditing the damage the ship has suffered, as well as the losses among the crew. It is a routine procedure — one in which I have become quite proficient."
languages.original_text: "Считаю, что Вашей Светлости необходимо пробиваться на заставу блюстителей. Там вам будет безопаснее, а мы тут переведем дух и выкурим из нор еще десяток-другой еретиков. Если Бог-Император будет милостив, и я смогу избежать славной гибели с вашим именем на устах, то мне предстоит большая работа по ревизии ущерба судну и потерь экипажа. Но это уже привычная процедура, я в ней изрядно поднаторел".

traits.locale_text: "I think Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should head for the enforcers' post. You will be safe there, and we will take a breather and smoke a few more dozen heretics out of their holes. If the God-Emperor is wills it, I will avoid a glorious death with your name on my lips and start auditing the damage dealt to the ship and tallying the losses among the crew. But it's a routine procedure I have become quite proficient in."

But it's a routine procedure I have become quite proficient in."

languages.text: «Creo que mi{mf|lord|lady} debería dirigirse al puesto de guardia. Allí estará a salvo. Mientras tanto, nosotros sacaremos a un puñado de herejes más de sus agujeros después de un descanso. Si el Dios Emperador quiere, no tendré que morir de forma gloriosa con su nombre en mis labios y empezaré a auditar los daños a la nave, así como las bajas entre la tripulación. Es un procedimiento rutinario en el que ya tengo bastante experiencia».
languages.original_text: "I think Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should head for the enforcers' post. You will be safer there. Meanwhile, we will take a breather and smoke a few more dozen heretics out of their holes. God-Emperor willing, I will not have to die a glorious death with your name on my lips after all and will instead begin auditing the damage the ship has suffered, as well as the losses among the crew. It is a routine procedure — one in which I have become quite proficient."

Es un procedimiento rutinario en el que ya tengo bastante experiencia».

languages.text: 「陛下はエンフォーサーの駐屯所に向かうべきだと思います。そちらの方が安全でしょう。その間に我々は一息ついて、あと数十人の異端者に穴を空けて煙を上げてみせますよ。神帝陛下がお望みなら、私は陛下のお名前を口にして名誉の死を遂げる必要はありません。その代わりに、船が被った損害とクルーの損失の調査をしようと思っています。日常的によくしていることですし、この手のことならプロですよ」
languages.original_text: "I think Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should head for the enforcers' post. You will be safer there. Meanwhile, we will take a breather and smoke a few more dozen heretics out of their holes. God-Emperor willing, I will not have to die a glorious death with your name on my lips after all and will instead begin auditing the damage the ship has suffered, as well as the losses among the crew. It is a routine procedure — one in which I have become quite proficient."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下はエンフォーサーの駐屯所に向かうべきだと思います。そちらの方が安全でしょう。その間に我々は一息ついて、あと数十人の異端者に穴を空けて煙を上げてみせますよ。神帝陛下がお望みなら、私は陛下のお名前を口にして名誉の死を遂げる必要はありません。その代わりに、船が被った損害とクルーの損失の調査をしようと思っています。日常的によくしていることですし、この手のことならプロですよ」

languages.text: “大人，我认为您应该先前往执法者的哨站，您在那里应该会更加安全。至于我们，我们打算先休息一下，之后再把几十个异端分子从他们的老巢里赶出来。如果神皇保佑的话，说不定我就不用念着您的名字光荣赴死了。说不定等这一切结束之后，我还能有机会统计这艘船遭受的损失，以及船员的伤亡状况，这个例行程序我已经相当熟练了。”
languages.original_text: "I think Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should head for the enforcers' post. You will be safer there. Meanwhile, we will take a breather and smoke a few more dozen heretics out of their holes. God-Emperor willing, I will not have to die a glorious death with your name on my lips after all and will instead begin auditing the damage the ship has suffered, as well as the losses among the crew. It is a routine procedure — one in which I have become quite proficient."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我认为您应该先前往执法者的哨站，您在那里应该会更加安全。至于我们，我们打算先休息一下，之后再把几十个异端分子从他们的老巢里赶出来。如果神皇保佑的话，说不定我就不用念着您的名字光荣赴死了。说不定等这一切结束之后，我还能有机会统计这艘船遭受的损失，以及船员的伤亡状况，这个例行程序我已经相当熟练了。”

languages.text: "Ich glaube, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} sollte zum Enforcer-Posten gehen. Dort seid Ihr sicherer. Wir atmen derweil ein wenig durch und räuchern hier noch ein paar Dutzend Ketzer aus. So der Gottimperator will, werde ich doch keinen glorreichen Tod mit Eurem Namen auf den Lippen sterben müssen, sondern kann stattdessen damit beginnen, die Schäden am Schiff sowie die Verluste unter der Crew zu protokollieren. Das ist ein Routineverfahren, das ich inzwischen aus dem Effeff beherrsche."
languages.original_text: "I think Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should head for the enforcers' post. You will be safer there. Meanwhile, we will take a breather and smoke a few more dozen heretics out of their holes. God-Emperor willing, I will not have to die a glorious death with your name on my lips after all and will instead begin auditing the damage the ship has suffered, as well as the losses among the crew. It is a routine procedure — one in which I have become quite proficient."

So der Gottimperator will, werde ich doch keinen glorreichen Tod mit Eurem Namen auf den Lippen sterben müssen, sondern kann stattdessen damit beginnen, die Schäden am Schiff sowie die Verluste unter der Crew zu protokollieren. Das ist ein Routineverfahren, das ich inzwischen aus dem Effeff beherrsche."

languages.text: « Je suggère à Votre Seigneurie de rejoindre le poste des prévôts. Vous y serez plus en sécurité. De notre côté, nous allons souffler un peu et tenter de faire sortir autant d'hérétiques que possible de leur trou. Si l'Empereur-Dieu le veut, plutôt que de mourir couvert de gloire avec votre nom sur les lèvres, je pourrais très bientôt évaluer les dégâts subis par le vaisseau et compter les pertes parmi l'équipage. C'est une procédure de routine que je maîtrise désormais à la perfection. »
languages.original_text: "I think Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should head for the enforcers' post. You will be safer there. Meanwhile, we will take a breather and smoke a few more dozen heretics out of their holes. God-Emperor willing, I will not have to die a glorious death with your name on my lips after all and will instead begin auditing the damage the ship has suffered, as well as the losses among the crew. It is a routine procedure — one in which I have become quite proficient."

C'est une procédure de routine que je maîtrise désormais à la perfection. »

languages.text: "Fikrimce zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, infazcı mahalline doğru yola çıkmalı. Orada daha güvende olursunuz. Bu sırada biz de dinlenip onlarca kâfiri daha saklandıkları delikten çıkarırız. Tanrı İmparator izin verirse sizin adınızı anarak şanlı bir ölüme kavuşmama gerek kalmaz da geminin gördüğü hasarı ve mürettebattaki kayıpları ölçme imkânım olur. Rutin bir prosedür bu, hatta artık üzerinde uzmanlaştığımı söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "I think Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should head for the enforcers' post. You will be safer there. Meanwhile, we will take a breather and smoke a few more dozen heretics out of their holes. God-Emperor willing, I will not have to die a glorious death with your name on my lips after all and will instead begin auditing the damage the ship has suffered, as well as the losses among the crew. It is a routine procedure — one in which I have become quite proficient."
